description:
From equalizing a belay, turning a thread into an anchor, or straightening out a wandering route, slings are an endlessly useful bit of kit. Made with a tubular weave, Blue Ice’s Mission Light slings are super strong and don’t have any edges to wear out.

  • UHMWPE (Ultra Light Molecular Weight Polyethylene) is soft and supple
  • Tubular variable weave construction reduces weight while increasing durability strength
  • Colour-coded for easy indexing
  • CE/EN 566, UIAA 104 certified
name: Blue Ice Mission Light Slings
